blog.name: daddiesdrarryy
blog.title: daddiesdrarry
blog.description: Melanie | Halfblood witch | Draco and Harry are my daddies | Ig: daddiesdrarry | Ao3: Melanie_Bxx | Profile pic is from the talented @dreamydrarry (used with permission). Occasionally make textposts and drabbles. Feel free to ask and message me xx

body:
Drarry in their late 40s

Draco *gets out of bed covered in the blanket*

Harry: What on Earth are you doing?

Draco: Getting dressed

Harry: Why are you dancing around in that tent business?

Draco: Because I don’t want you to see any of my wobbly bits

Harry: Well now that’s a bit pointless, isn’t it? As I happen to have a very high regard for your wobbly bits. In all circumstances. And plus, we’re married

Draco: Really?

Harry: Absolutely, I think it’s high time we had another look *winks*

title: Marriage Demand

by temptresslove

Harry Potter proposes to Tom Riddle just before they graduate. They’ve never even spoken to each other before.

title: Le 21 Décembre : Hogwart Mysteries
body:
Le 21 Décembre : Hogwart Mysteries

Je voulais vous faire un article sur les films à regarder à Noël, mais je ne suis pas très originale sur le sujet, je suis plus série et en plus, je vous en ai déjà parlé ou vous connaissez !

En effet, mes films sont, les Harry Potter et Animaux Fantastiques, classiques ;

Love Actually, incontournable !

Et le téléfilm adapté du Père Porcher de Pratchett, j’avais déjà fait un article ici.

Donc,…

View On WordPress

summary:
Harry: Malfoy is beautiful 
Ron: What?
Harry: Oh come on, you can't be surprise about this, right?
Ron: I thought I should be....
body:
Harry: Malfoy is beautiful 
Ron: What?
Harry: Oh come on, you can't be surprise about this, right?
Ron: I thought I should be. For appearances, you know

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: Oh come on, you can't be surprise about this, right?

dialogue.name: Ron

dialogue.phrase: I thought I should be. For appearances, you know

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: loonyasalovegood
blog.title: The Yearbook of a Broadway Hopeful
blog.description: Just a naive semi-adult trying to navigate her way through this thing called life. After I graduate, I’ll be pursuing a career on Broadway, so this will be the place where I document the adventure for future generations. Mary Poppins is my spirit animal.

tags: i have no queue what I'm doing
summary: IDK, but for having not drawn for nearly fifteen years, I’m alright with this. It’s just a quick doodle of Percy and Audrey.

blog.name: shadowywinnergalaxy
blog.title: Random Fandom Shit
blog.description: Ravenclaw , Oncer , harmonizer , Camilizer , Jaguar , The Nation , Dinahsty , Allygience , Avocado , Teen Wolf , DC , Marvel , DCEU , Sabrina Carpenter , Barbz , Arianiator

summary: So I just watched Fantastic Beasts : The Crimes Of Grindelwald , and it was amazing . It didn't disappoint . It had a balance of...
body: So I just watched Fantastic Beasts : The Crimes Of Grindelwald , and it was amazing . It didn’t disappoint . It had a balance of romance , heartbreak , battle and much more . The heart break broke me tho . Jacob not joining Queenie , Credence leaving Nagini , Leta dying , the heartbreak on Theseaus’s face . Mostly I feel sad for Queenie and Nagini . Queenie wanted to be with Jacob but his coward ass refused to go with her. Nagini was heart broken when Credence left and also she has to spend time with that fanatic Voldemort and ultimately die . Grindelwald is a really good character . He doesn’t want to kill people he wants nature to do it for him . If the Statue of Secrecy is broken then the wizards wouldn’t have to hide and ultimately fall in love with The Muggles and then their offsprings will be magical which will reduce the muggles and they will ultimately die off #TeamGrindelwald
